actionProfiles.description: Updates existing Inventory Instances based on Inventory single record imports

content.name: Inventory Single Record - Default match for no SRS record
content.description: Matches the Instance UUID from the 999 ff $i in the incoming MARC record to the UUID of the existing Instance record

content.name: Inventory Single Record - Default Update Instance
content.description: Triggered by an action in Inventory, this job profile imports a single record from an external system, to update an existing Instance, and either create a new MARC record or update an existing MARC record

actionProfiles.name: Default - Create MARC holdings
actionProfiles.description: This action profile is used with FOLIO's default job profile for creating Inventory Holdings and SRS MARC Holdings records. It cannot be edited, duplicated, or deleted.

content.name: Default - Create Holdings and SRS MARC Holdings
content.description: Default job profile for creating MARC holdings and corresponding Inventory holdings. Profile cannot be edited or deleted

content.name: Default Create MARC holdings and Inventory holdings
content.description: This field mapping profile is used with FOLIO's default job profile for creating Inventory Holdings and SRS MARC Holdings records. It cannot be edited, duplicated, deleted, or linked to additional action profiles.

actionProfiles.name: quickMARC Derive - Create Inventory Holdings
actionProfiles.description: This action profile is used with FOLIO's default job profile for creating Inventory Holdings and SRS MARC Holdings records. It cannot be edited or deleted.

content.name: quickMARC - Create Holdings and SRS MARC Holdings
content.description: This job profile is used by the quickMARC to allow a user to create a new SRS MARC holdings record and corresponding Inventory holdings. Profile cannot be edited or deleted

content.name: quickMARC - Create MARC holdings and Inventory holdings
content.description: This field mapping profile is used with FOLIO's default job profile for creating Inventory Holdings and SRS MARC Holdings records. It cannot be edited, duplicated, or deleted.

actionProfiles.name: Default - Create instance
actionProfiles.description: This action profile is used with FOLIO's default job profile for creating Inventory Instances and SRS MARC Bibliographic records. It can be edited, duplicated, or deleted.

content.name: Default - Create instance and SRS MARC Bib
content.description: This job profile creates SRS MARC Bib records and corresponding Inventory Instances using the library's default MARC-to-Instance mapping. It can be edited, duplicated, or deleted.

content.description: Skapar bibliografisk post, med tillhörande bestånd och exemplar utifrån sammanslagen Libris-post.

content.name: Default - Create instance
content.description: This field mapping profile is used with FOLIO's default job profile for creating Inventory Instances and SRS MARC Bibliographic records. It can be edited, duplicated, deleted, or linked to additional action profiles.

actionProfiles.name: quickMARC Derive - Create Inventory Instance
actionProfiles.description: This action profile is used by the quickMARC Derive action to create a new Inventory Instance. It cannot be edited or deleted.

content.name: quickMARC - Derive a new SRS MARC Bib and Instance
content.description: This job profile is used by the quickMARC Derive action to create a new SRS MARC Bib record and corresponding Inventory Instance. It cannot be edited or deleted.

content.name: quickMARC Derive - Create Inventory Instance
content.description: This field mapping profile is used by the quickMARC Derive action to create an Inventory Instance. It cannot be edited or deleted.

actionProfiles.name: Default - Create MARC Authority
actionProfiles.description: This action profile is used with FOLIO's default job profile for creating a MARC authority record in source-record-storage. It cannot be edited, duplicated, or deleted.

content.name: Default - Create SRS MARC Authority
content.description: Default job profile for creating MARC authority records. These records are stored in source record storage (SRS). Profile cannot be deleted.

content.name: Default - Create MARC Authority
content.description: This field mapping profile is used with FOLIO's default job profile for creating MARC Authority records. It cannot be edited, duplicated, deleted, or linked to additional action profiles.
